rooms.description: spacious entryway with natural light from overhead skylights and glass panel doors to ensure energy efficiency, adhering to Vastu guidelines for auspicious entry.

Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows oriented east-west to capture natural light. Scandinavian minimalist design with functional furniture and a neutral color palette for maximum ventilation.
Integrated dining space within the living area featuring an extendable table that doubles as workspace. Abundance of natural light and cross ventilation through strategically placed windows.

Modern Scandinavian kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, ample counter space, and a focus on natural ventilation. Skylights installed to ensure daylight penetration in alignment with Vastu principles.

A dedicated library space designed for quiet study and reflection, featuring built-in shelves, comfortable seating, and large windows to maintain a bright, airy ambience. The orientation is optimized for natural light without compromising privacy.

The penthouse includes four spacious bedrooms, each designed with minimalist decor and generous windows for optimal ventilation. The master bedroom features an en-suite bathroom and additional closet space.
A dedicated guest room ensuring privacy and comfort, with ample natural light from north-facing windows.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows oriented east and west to maximize natural light throughout the day.
Large bay windows for enhanced natural lighting while maintaining a quiet ambiance.
Skylights installed to provide additional daylighting in central areas.
Energy-efficient glass door with sound insulation ensuring secure entry while enhancing natural light penetration.
